# admiralty-table



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Use tables to make information easier for users to scan and compare

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `caption` | `caption` |             | `string` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                 |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------- |
|      | Table elements should be placed in the slot |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                    | Description                       |
| --------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `--admiralty-table-heading-font-size`   | Font size for the table heading   |
| `--admiralty-table-heading-font-weight` | Font weight for the table heading |
